paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information for the TTR gene, including penetrance data for affected and unaffected carriers.

patients.demographics: Age at onset varied from 45 to 75 years (mean: 59.6)

individual_records.evidence_sentence: The 18 patients harbored six different TTR mutations: Phe64Leu (n.7), Glu89Gln (n.5), Val30Met (n.2), Thr49Ala (n.2), Val122Ile (n.1), and Ala109Ser (n.1).
